watch_video: Watch now to be sure you're going to heaven

action_modal.questions_text: Please fill out the form below with any questions or comments you might have. Also be sure to check out the recommended videos on the main page.
action_modal.saved_text_end: If you would like to reach out and personally let us know that you got saved today, please fill out the form below. We would love to hear from you!
action_modal.saved_text_start: Now that you are saved, the next steps are to:
action_modal.message_placeholder: Leave your name and any comments, prayer requests, questions, etc...
